I have the following T206s for sale:

Ted Breitenstein - Piedmont 350 - PSA 2 - $75.00
Scoops Carey - Old Mill - PSA 4.5 - $275.00

Sherry Magee (With Bat) - Piedmont Factory 42 - PSA 1 - $275.00

If interested, please e-mail [url]bowen@bowenlaw.us[/url].  Thanks.

Marty
